mapper.sql: LEASE_ID, WEBSITE_STATE, WEBSITE_LAST_UP_TIME, WEBSITE_LAST_DOWN_TIME, MLHF_STATE, MLHF_LAST_UP_TIME, MLHF_LAST_DOWN_TIME, LAST_ACTION_USER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_LEASE_PUBLISH_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_LEASE_PUBLISH_INFO (LEASE_ID, WEBSITE_STATE, WEBSITE_LAST_UP_TIME, WEBSITE_LAST_DOWN_TIME, MLHF_STATE, MLHF_LAST_UP_TIME, MLHF_LAST_DOWN_TIME, LAST_ACTION_USER_ID) values (#{leaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mlhfState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mlhfLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mlhfLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastActionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update FUN_LEASE_PUBLISH_INFO
LEASE_ID = #{record.leaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_STATE = #{record.websiteState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LAST_UP_TIME = #{record.websiteLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LAST_DOWN_TIME = #{record.websiteLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MLHF_STATE = #{record.mlhfState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_ACTION_USER_ID = #{record.lastActionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update FUN_LEASE_PUBLISH_INFO
WEBSITE_STATE = #{websiteState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LAST_UP_TIME = #{websiteLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LAST_DOWN_TIME = #{websiteLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MLHF_STATE = #{mlhfState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MLHF_LAST_UP_TIME = #{mlhfLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MLHF_LAST_DOWN_TIME = #{mlhfLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_ACTION_USER_ID = #{lastActionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where LEASE_ID = #{leaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FUN_LEASE_PUBLISH_INFO set WEBSITE_STATE = #{websiteState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_LAST_UP_TIME = #{websiteLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_LAST_DOWN_TIME = #{websiteLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MLHF_STATE = #{mlhfState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MLHF_LAST_UP_TIME = #{mlhfLastUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MLHF_LAST_DOWN_TIME = #{mlhfLastDownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_ACTION_USER_ID = #{lastActionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where LEASE_ID = #{leaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT A.LEASE_ID from FUN_LEASE A LEFT JOIN LEASE_PEOPLE_RELATIVE B ON A.LEASE_ID=B.LEASE_ID AND B.DEL_FLAG=0 LEFT JOIN FUN_ENTRUST C ON A.LEASE_ID=C.CASE_ID AND CASE_TYPE=2 AND IS_EFFECTIVE=1 LEFT JOIN FUN_USERS D ON B.USER_ID=D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN FUN_USERS E ON C.RECORD_USER=E.USER_ID LEFT JOIN FUN_LEASE_PUBLISH_INFO F ON A.LEASE_ID=F.LEASE_ID WHERE B.PEOPLE_TYPE IN(2,3) AND D.USER_WRITEOFF=0 AND E.USER_WRITEOFF=0 AND F.WEBSITE_STATE='1' AND A.USER_ID=#{userId}
